body:
Features and Enhancements

Components
  • New Features or Enhancements
    • Landing Page:
      • A N360 Banner was added to promote the new homepage redesign and offers users a webinar registration link to attend either June 3rd or June 8th.
      • Webinar registration link:
      • Register Here
    • Help Section:
      • A Help Section was added to support the new Insights Dashboard to help clients that subscribe to this feature.
  • Fixed Issues
    • Look up a Provider:
      • To make it easier for users to understand the Name field is required. The "Required" error message is now aligned under the Name field.
    • Measure Access:
      • Fixed the error that occurred when a user would change a Project after starting to perform an analysis.
    • NBO:
      • On the Summary Page - If the user attempts to export data when there are no Groups nor Models setup yet in a new or existing Network Model. The System now displays this notification message: "There is currently nothing to export. Please revise selection criteria and try again."
      • Improved Find Providers query performance for NBO.
      • Clients/Projects/Users that do not have NBO enabled now see the notification screen letting them know the functionality is not enabled.
      • When the user tries to export a Network Model without any Groups or Providers. Users will now see the message: "There is currently nothing to export. Please revise selection criteria and try again."
      • Group-Specialty Custom Attributes:
        • Find Groups: Changed "No Results" message to "Remove current selection to view other options"
